EmailTemplate.description: Welcome to our QuickBooks Payment Solutions Onboarding Program
EmailTemplate.name: Intro PCS
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! and Welcome to QuickBooks Payments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Account #{!Contact.CAN__c}
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Congratulations on your purchase of QuickBooks Payment Solutions. We’ve recently developed a new onboarding program that’s included with your purchase. As your Onboarding Account Manager, I will be working with you to link and train you on your new QuickBooks Payments. Here’s a quick overview of what the program looks like. Onboarding Account Manager: As your primary contact, I will learn your general business needs and help to guide you through the transition to Intuit Payments.
Link: If you haven’t already linked your payments account, I will walk you through linking your Merchant Services to your QuickBooks.
Training: We will walk you through your first real transaction to ensure that you are comfortable and confident when accepting payments. We will also walk you through your first reconciliation training and provide resources for your reference. If you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to reach out to me.
Thanks for your time and have a great day!
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}| Enterprise Account Manager Work Phone: {!User.Phone} ext {!User.Extension} | {!User.Email}
Intuit | simplify the business of life
this transmittal is intended only for the use of the individual or entity to which it is addressed and may contain information that is privileged, confidential and exempt from disclosure under applicable law. If the reader of this transmittal is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible for delivering the transmittal to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited.
